about_the_game:
Get more out of Raia Nova and support the dev with the Blue Supporter Pack.

This pack adds 30 new items to the game. It also unlocks the Majestic Dream Coat costume for all characters, and the Costume Color Card.

The Costume Color Card lets you choose any color for any costume that allows it. The new costume Majestic Dream Coat will be available on all characters.

This is an expansion of what items are in the game, so, to avoid "pay to win" situations, the items are like other items, they can be found or traded for. "Sands of Arca" can be traded for most of them, see the "Hub Menu". The items are not stronger than other items, but expand your builds and utility options.
Items provide skills, skill enhancements, or buffs. The new items provide the following.

Skills:

  • Wind Sway - Use Samurai like combos.
  • Soul Ball - Combine multiple projectiles together.
  • Beautiful Flunge - Stab forward with pink energy.
  • Atrocity Spikes - Mines with Stabbing Spikes
  • Shadowy Zone - Do damage slowly and make targets vulnerable.
  • Shock Raid - Shock a curved area.
  • Napalm Rain - Burn targets repeatedly.
  • Blood Rain - Drop spikes of blood and make targets vulnerable.
  • Radiate - Make deadly objects, kills spread the area.
  • Ash Wolf Mist - Spread mist that hides deadly claws.
  • Call of Broken Dreams - Use magic shards to strike repeatedly.
  • Ice Fist - A punch that creates a circle of frost.
  • Crane Yoyo - This toy spins and slashes as you move it.
  • Goring Stamp - Damage things around you as you run.
  • Ghost Cannon - Shoot an explosive shell.
  • Rocket Roar - Rocket forward leaving burning fire.
  • Mortar - Shoot an arcing explosive that can increase in size.
  • Brood Spiders - Create deadly spiders.
  • Storm Axe - Shoot spinning axes as you slash.
  • Caroway Reaper - A magical ally that uses a scythe
  • Meteor - Call down a meteor.

Enhancers and Buffs:

  • Jelly Canister - Targets explode on contact with fire.
  • Fate Seal - Targets leave explosive "Souls".
  • Fate Tether - "Souls" can be called to you, cutting in a line.
  • Sustain Driver - Gives you power for sustained battles.
  • Radiant Aura Belt - Radiate and damage everything nearby.
  • Predator Spines Crest - Shoot spikes everywhere.
  • Corrupted Land Crest - Cause an earthquake that inflicts Corruption.
  • Low Synergy Belt - Gain power on low energy.
